_aChangeLog.text: new modes, new song, new things

_sText:
mg_ka_trains_detach_evo

 Hello, I remade this map, by adding something to make it more mg_ ....
Modes.

The mapmaker of mg_ka_trains_detach tried to do something like this but forgot some output in an entity ^^

Modes

 The map is split into 2 globals "modes".
Per default, the mode is "Fun", and got 10 modes possible.
In the other mode you can only play Normal & Autobhop (which need a plugin i included)
  • Normal (like the old ka_trains_detach)
  • Autobhop (it needs the infinite-jumping plugin you can find at https://forums.alliedmods.net/showthread.php?p=1239361 or in the file)
  • Drug (everyone is drugged and get some colors on the screen (it use sm_drug command)
  • Low Grav (you get low gravity)
  • Blind (your screen became almost black (it uses sm_blind 230 command) )
  • ScoutKnivez (give you scout and low gravity)
  • 1 HP mode
  • 200 HP mode
  • Big players (it's 2x Size)
  • Little players (its mini size)
  • Mushroom Drug (you get a drugged screen)

Some Skins

 CT get a random big-head skin every round and T get a random big-head skin every round.

Some Musics

 Music is played automatically in "Fun" Mode
  • El mudo - Chacarron Macarron
  • Matrix Futurebound ft. Luke Bingham - All i know
  • Benny Hill - Theme
  • Darude - SandStorm
  • Scatman
  • Titanic Flute
  • Le Internet Medlay
  • Chineese Music

How to change mode

 If you are admin, just noclip to the room with dev-texture colored.
  • Button at the right to enable "Fun" Mode
  • Button at the left to enable "Classic" Mode
If no admins on, you can go there, by first going in the skybox using a teleporter there: And then press a "secret" button on the ground (check the edge of the skybox to see it). When you go in the skybox, your skin become a daft punk skin.

Enjoy
